attributes.action: give pubs, resturants & cooffee shops the choice to allow smoking or not
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
buisnesses have to pay buisness rates & taxes etc to sell drinks & food so should surely have the right to choose whether they wish to allow smoking on their premises or not.
this way there could rightly be totally non smoking and totally smoking only premises making the country as a whole catered for instead of us, as adults having the freedom of free will & choice being taken away.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
